column5: well Canada won the gold..and maybe this year the cup...The Cup...but we're comin up again to hunt down your walleyes. as an ami....I pledge to catch and release!....eh..maybe a few eaters. hope your winter went well...and from all of us down here...here's to a great summer!!!!!!!!!!!!!
We don't know what happened, but all the walleye have gone. It's the darndest thing. So y'all might as well stay home...honest...there's no fish here...ssshhhhh...I think they believe me...
Well i hope you don't come to Northern Manitoba lol,if you do don't come to soon.We still have 33 inches of ice.FISH ON.
Come on up, enjoy yourself. derrek.CANADIAN WALLEYE OPEN UP AND SAY "EH"!
I suppose there's also been a national shortage of blue too, eh?

12 years ago I use to work at a lodge in Ontario. The americans were always the friendliest, nicest guests I had the plesure to guide for.Never had a complaint about an american guest, in fact of the time I was up there the only people I kept in touch with were some guests from PA and NY. Come on UP. WE like your company.
